CustomField.description: This field will be populated by HRIS and fed down to Reference Agency object with a formula field. It will display the aggregated FTE count for prior year for active ESR clients and is the max number from aagc_fte_count from esr.aggregated_ale_group_count in HRIS. This number determines the ALE status for the next filing year. Case 24776323
CustomField.label: ESR FTE Count for Prior Year
